name: Ski Jumpers - Play Free Pixel 8-bit Skiing Games
name_original: Ski Jumpers - Play Free Pixel 8-bit Skiing Games
description:
Love mountain skiing? Then this game is for you! Ski and jump away with our hero. Get your best score and compete with other players in Game Center. Share your best score on Facebook and Twitter.

Features:

- Quick one tap game play
- 8-bit style
- Challenging feel
- Game Center integrated for more fun
- Awesome for both kids and adults
- Everything is FREE. No hidden costs.

Play now >>>
